instructions:
Combine and heat the above ingredients except the kielbasa and the cornstarch mixture. Simmer for a few
minutes, add the corn starch mixture and cook till thickened. Fry the kielbasa pieces until heated and slightly
browned. Remove to a warm serving dish and pour sauce over sausage.
ingredients: 1 lb kielbasa, cut in 6 pieces and halved
1 tbsp cornstarch dissolved in 1 tbsp water
name: Kielbasa With Jelly Sauce
